001package com.github.sormuras.bach.builder;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Configuration;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Grabber;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolCall;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolFinder;
008import com.github.sormuras.bach.ToolRun;
009import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleDescriptorSupport;
010import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ModuleFinderSupport;
011import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
012import java.io.File;
013import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor;
014import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor.Version;
015import java.lang.module.ModuleFinder;
016import java.nio.file.Files;
017import java.nio.file.Path;
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023/** An API for building modular Java projects using conventional source file tree layouts. */
024public sealed interface Conventional {
025
026  /** Conventional module space descriptor. */
027  record Space(
028      Optional<String> name,
029      List<String> modules,
030      List<String> moduleSourcePaths,
031      List<Path> modulePaths,
032      Path destinationDirectory) {
033
034    /** Copy-and-set the specified component. */
035    private Space modulePaths(List<Path> modulePaths) {
036      return new Space(
037          name, modules, moduleSourcePaths, List.copyOf(modulePaths), destinationDirectory);
038    }
039
040    /** Copy-and-add one or more elements to the specified component. */
041    private Space withModulePath(Path path, Path... more) {
042      var modulePaths = new ArrayList<>(this.modulePaths);
043      modulePaths.add(path);
044      if (more.length > 0) modulePaths.addAll(List.of(more));
045      return modulePaths(List.copyOf(modulePaths));
046    }
047  }
048
049  /** Conventional project builder. */
050  record Builder(Bach bach, Space space) implements Conventional {
051
052    public Builder dependentSpace(String name, String... modules) {
053      if (name.equals(space.name.orElse("?")))
054        throw new IllegalArgumentException("name collision: " + name);
055
056      var dependent =
057          new BuilderFactory(bach)
058              .conventionalSpace(name, modules)
059              .space()
060              .withModulePath(getModulesDirectory());
061      return new Builder(bach, dependent);
062    }
063
064    public void grab(Grabber grabber, String... externalModules) {
065      grabber.grabExternalModules(externalModules);
066      grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
067    }
068
069    public void compile() {
070      compile(ToolCall.Composer.identity());
071    }
072
073    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer) {
074      compile(javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer.identity());
075    }
076
077    public void compile(ToolCall.Composer javacComposer, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
078      var size = space.modules.size();
079      var plurals = size == 1 ? "" : "s";
080      var name = space.name.orElse("Java");
081      bach.logCaption("Compile %d conventional %s module%s".formatted(size, name, plurals));
082
083      var javac = ToolCall.of("javac");
084      javac.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules));
085      javac.with("--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
086      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javac.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
087      javac.with("-d", getClassesDirectory());
088      bach.run(javacComposer.apply(javac));
089
090      var jars = new ArrayList<ToolCall>();
091      for (var module : space.modules) jars.add(generateJarCall(module, jarComposer));
092      bach.run("directories", dir -> dir.with("clean").with(getModulesDirectory()));
093      jars.parallelStream().forEach(bach::run);
094    }
095
096    public void document(ToolCall.Composer javadocComposer) {
097      var api = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "documentation", "api");
098      var javadoc = ToolCall.of("javadoc");
099      javadoc.with("--module", String.join(",", space.modules));
100      javadoc.with(
101          "--module-source-path", String.join(File.pathSeparator, space.moduleSourcePaths));
102      if (!getModulePaths().isEmpty()) javadoc.with("--module-path", getModulePaths());
103      javadoc.with("-d", api);
104      bach.run(javadocComposer.apply(javadoc));
105
106      var jar =
107          ToolCall.of("jar")
108              .with("--create")
109              .with("--file", api.getParent().resolve("api.zip"))
110              .with("--no-manifest")
111              .with("-C", api, ".");
112      bach.run(jar);
113    }
114
115    public void link(ToolCall.Composer jlinkComposer) {
116      var image = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "image");
117      var jlink = ToolCall.of("jlink");
118      jlink.with("--output", image);
119      jlink.with("--add-modules", String.join(",", space.modules));
120      jlink.with("--module-path", List.of(getModulesDirectory(), bach.path().externalModules()));
121      bach.run("directories", run -> run.with("delete").with(image));
122      bach.run(jlinkComposer.apply(jlink));
123    }
124
125    public void runAllTests() {
126      var name = space.name.orElse("this");
127      bach.logCaption("Run all tests in %s space".formatted(name));
128      var moduleFinder = getRuntimeModuleFinder();
129      for (var module : space.modules) {
130        if (ModuleFinderSupport.findMainClass(moduleFinder, module).isPresent()) {
131          runModule(moduleFinder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
132        }
133        var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(moduleFinder, true, module);
134        runTool(toolFinder, "test", ToolCall.Composer.identity(), bach.printer()::print);
135        if (toolFinder.find("junit").isPresent()) runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
136      }
137    }
138
139    public void runModule(String module, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
140      runModule(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), module, composer, bach.printer()::print);
141    }
142
143    public void runModule(
144        ModuleFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor verifier) {
145      var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.module(finder, module));
146      var run = bach.run(call);
147      verifier.accept(run);
148    }
149
150    public void runTool(String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer) {
151      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true);
152      runTool(toolFinder, tool, composer, bach.printer()::print);
153    }
154
155    public void runTool(
156        ToolFinder finder, String tool, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
157      for (var provider : finder.list(tool)) {
158        var singleton = ToolFinder.of(provider);
159        var call = composer.apply(ToolCall.of(singleton, tool));
160        var run = bach.run(call);
161        visitor.accept(run);
162      }
163    }
164
165    public void runJUnit(String module) {
166      var toolFinder = ToolFinder.of(getRuntimeModuleFinder(), true, module);
167      runJUnit(toolFinder, module);
168    }
169
170    public void runJUnit(ToolFinder finder, String module) {
171      runJUnit(finder, module, ToolCall.Composer.identity(), ToolRun.Visitor.noop());
172    }
173
174    public void runJUnit(
175        ToolFinder finder, String module, ToolCall.Composer composer, ToolRun.Visitor visitor) {
176      var reports = bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "reports", "junit", module);
177      var junit =
178          ToolCall.of(finder, "junit")
179              .with("--select-module", module)
180              .with("--reports-dir", reports);
181      var call = composer.apply(junit);
182      var run = bach.run(call);
183      visitor.accept(run);
184    }
185
186    private ToolCall generateJarCall(String module, ToolCall.Composer jarComposer) {
187      var version = findVersion(module);
188      var file =
189          version
190              .map(value -> Configuration.computeJarFileName(module, value))
191              .orElseGet(() -> module + ".jar");
192      var jar = ToolCall.of("jar");
193      jar.with("--create");
194      jar.with("--file", getModulesDirectory().resolve(file));
195      version.ifPresent(v -> jar.with("--module-version", v));
196      findMainClass(module).ifPresent(mainClass -> jar.with("--main-class", mainClass));
197      var composed = jarComposer.apply(jar);
198      composed.with("-C", getClassesDirectory().resolve(module), ".");
199      return composed;
200    }
201
202    private Optional<Version> findVersion(String module) {
203      return Optional.empty();
204    }
205
206    private Optional<String> findMainClass(String module) {
207      var name = module + ".Main";
208      var path = Path.of(name.replace('.', '/') + ".class");
209      var file = getClassesDirectory().resolve(module).resolve(path);
210      return Files.exists(file) ? Optional.of(name) : Optional.empty();
211    }
212
213    private List<Path> getModulePaths() {
214      var paths = new ArrayList<>(space.modulePaths());
215      var externalModules = bach.path().externalModules();
216      if (Files.isDirectory(externalModules) && !paths.contains(externalModules))
217        paths.add(externalModules);
218      return List.copyOf(paths);
219    }
220
221    private Path getClassesDirectory() {
222      return bach.path().workspace(space.name.orElse(""), "classes");
223    }
224
225    private Path getModulesDirectory() {
226      return bach.path().workspace().resolve(space.destinationDirectory);
227    }
228
229    private ModuleFinder getRuntimeModuleFinder() {
230      var paths = new ArrayList<Path>();
231      paths.add(getModulesDirectory());
232      paths.addAll(getModulePaths());
233      return ModuleFinder.of(paths.toArray(Path[]::new));
234    }
235  }
236
237  /** {@return a build program for the conventional unnamend space} */
238  static String generateUnnamedSpaceBuildProgram() {
239    var names =
240        PathSupport.find(Path.of(""), 99, PathSupport::isModuleInfoJavaFile).stream()
241            .map(ModuleDescriptorSupport::parse)
242            .map(ModuleDescriptor::name)
243            .sorted()
244            .toList();
245    var modules =
246        names.isEmpty()
247            ? "/* here be one or more module names */"
248            : names.stream().map(name -> '"' + name + '"').collect(Collectors.joining(", "));
249    return """
250          import com.github.sormuras.bach.*;
251
252          class build {
253            public static void main(String... args) {
254              try (var bach = new Bach(args)) {
255                var space = bach.builder().conventional(%s);
256                space.compile(javac -> javac.with("-Xlint").with("-Werror"), jar -> jar.with("--verbose"));
257                // space.runModule("MODULE[/MAINCLASS]", run -> run.with("--dry-run"));
258                // space.document(javadoc -> javadoc.with("-notimestamp").with("-Xdoclint:-missing"));
259                // space.link(jlink -> jlink.with("--launcher", "NAME=MODULE[/MAINCLASS]"));
260              }
261            }
262          }
263          """
264        .formatted(modules);
265  }
266
267  /** {@return a build program for a project using {@code main} and {@code test} space layout} */
268  static String generateMainAndTestSpaceBuildProgram() {
269    var mainModules = "/* here be one or more main modules */";
270    var testModules = "/* here be one or more test modules */";
271    return """
272          import com.github.sormuras.bach.*;
273
274          class build {
275            public static void main(String... args) {
276              try (var bach = new Bach(args)) {
277
278                var main = bach.builder().conventionalSpace("main", %s);
279                main.compile(javac -> javac.with("-Xlint").with("-Werror"), jar -> jar.with("--verbose"));
280
281                bach.logCaption("Perform automated checks");
282                var test = main.dependentSpace("test", %s);
283                // test.grab(bach.grabber(...), "org.junit.jupiter", "org.junit.platform.console");
284                test.compile(javac -> javac.with("-g").with("-parameters"));
285                test.runAllTests();
286
287                // bach.logCaption("Document API and link main modules into a custom runtime image");
288                // main.document(javadoc -> javadoc.with("-notimestamp").with("-Xdoclint:-missing"));
289                // main.link(jlink -> jlink.with("--launcher", "NAME=MODULE[/MAINCLASS]"));
290              }
291            }
292          }
293          """
294        .formatted(mainModules, testModules);
295  }
296}
